# Edit Subscription Name

In some cases, you might need to change the display name of a subscription so you can find it easily in your list of subscriptions.&#x20;

Subscriptions can be renamed using the **Rename** option on the subscription details page. You can rename only the subscriptions in the **Active** and **Updating** states.

{% hint style="info" %}
Changing the subscription name only affects its display in the Client Portal. The updated subscription name will not be reflected in the vendor's system.
{% endhint %}

## Editing a subscription's name

To rename a subscription:

1. Navigate to the **Subscriptions** page.
2. Select the subscription you want to rename.
3. On the subscription details page, select the arrow <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">and choose **Rename**.

<div data-with-frame="true"><figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/Rename1 (1).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Rename option on the details page</p></figcaption></figure></div>

4. In the **Rename** dialog, enter the new name and select **Save**.

<div data-with-frame="true"><figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (1065).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Rename a subscription</p></figcaption></figure></div>

The subscription is renamed, and the new name is visible across all pages that feature the subscription within the platform.&#x20;
